top_stories.title: Logmanager Unveils a Faster and Smarter Log Management Platform
top_stories.description: After doubling its revenue in two years, the company sees the new release as a key pillar of its mission to bring customers worldwide a log management solution without the enterprise overhead. Logmanager, a vendor of a log management platform recognized for its radical simplicity, today introduced a major new release. Logmanager... top_stories.title: 3 Ways NVIDIA Is Powering the Industrial Revolution
top_stories.description: The NVIDIA accelerated computing platform is leading supercomputing benchmarks once dominated by CPUs, enabling AI, science, business and computing efficiency worldwide. Moore’s Law has run its course, and parallel processing is the way forward. With this evolution, NVIDIA GPU platforms are now uniquely positioned to deliver on the three scaling laws — pretraining, post-training and Read Article

top_stories.title: Scaling MLflow for enterprise AI: What’s New in SageMaker AI with MLflow
top_stories.description: Today we’re announcing Amazon SageMaker AI with MLflow, now including a serverless capability that dynamically manages infrastructure provisioning, scaling, and operations for artificial intelligence and machine learning (AI/ML) development tasks. In this post, we explore how these new capabilities help you run large MLflow workloads—from generative AI agents to large language model (LLM) experimentation—with improved performance, automation, and security using SageMaker AI with MLflow.
top_stories.author: Sandeep Raveesh-Babu
top_stories.content: Today we’re announcing Amazon SageMaker AI with MLflow, now including a serverless capability that dynamically manages infrastructure provisioning, scaling, and operations for artificial intelligence and machine learning (AI/ML) development tasks. In this post, we explore how these new capabilities help you run large MLflow workloads—from generative AI agents to large language model (LLM) experimentation—with improved performance, automation, and security using SageMaker AI with MLflow.

top_stories.title: Project Gigabit Network Build Contract – Northern Ireland
top_stories.description: The Northern Ireland Executive has awarded broadband provider Fibrus a Project Gigabit contract to provide over 9000 premises across Northern Ireland with access to gigabit-capable broadband.
top_stories.content: The Northern Ireland Executive has awarded broadband provider Fibrus a Project Gigabit contract to provide over 9000 premises across Northern Ireland with access to gigabit-capable broadband.
